summary: A neural network model that processes raw audio signals using the Data2Vec architecture and produces frame-level logits suitable for Connectionist Temporal Classification, enabling end-to-end speech transcription or other sequence labeling tasks.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use pretrained or fine‑tunable model for converting spoken audio into text or other sequential labels, facilitating speech‑to‑text services, voice assistants, and audio analytics.
